hibernate-mapping.query:
update CCCComponentVersionDownloadedForClient ccccvd
set ccccvd.LastDownloadedVersionNo = :lastDownloadedVersionNo, ccccvd.Build = :build, ccccvd.IsManualUpdate = :isManualUpdate, ccccvd.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, ccccvd.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where ccccvd.Id = :id and ccccvd.TS = :ts and ccccvd.Active = true
select ccc.Id from CCCComponentVersionDownloadedForClient as ccc where ccc.WorkStationId = :workStationId and ccc.InstallerTypeId = :installerTypeId and ccc.Active = true

select new ccomdto05 (cccvdc.Id) from CCCComponentVersionDownloadedForClient cccvdc where cccvdc.WorkStationId = :workStationId and cccvdc.InstallerTypeId = :installerTypeId and cccvdc.LastDownloadedVersionNo = :lastdownloadedVersionNo and cccvdc.Build = :build and cccvdc.Active = true

update CCCComponentVersionDownloadedForClient cccvdc set cccvdc.WorkStationId = :workStationId, cccvdc.InstallerTypeId = :installerTypeId, cccvdc.LastDownloadedVersionNo = :lastdownloadedVersionNo, cccvdc.Build = :build, cccvdc.IsManualUpdate = true, cccvdc.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, cccvdc.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where cccvdc.Id = :id and cccvdc.TS = :ts and cccvdc.Active = true

select new ccomdto04 ( cccvdc.Id, cccvdc.LastDownloadedVersionNo, cccvdc.CreatedDate, cccvdc.TS, u.UserName, w.Code, w.Name, w.HostName, w.IPAddress, w.SourceBranchCode, wt.Description, i.Id, i.Description ) from CCCComponentVersionDownloadedForClient as cccvdc inner join cccvdc.CreatedUser as u with u.Active = true inner join cccvdc.WorkStation as w with w.Active = true inner join w.WorkStationType as wt with wt.Active = true inner join cccvdc.InstallerType as i with i.Active = true where cccvdc.Active = true and w.SourceBranchCode = :sourbranchCode order by w.SourceBranchCode asc, w.Code asc, cccvdc.InstallerTypeId asc ,cccvdc.Build desc
